name: A Void for Zoea
description:
A Void for Zoea an interactive story. Inspired by classic text adventures, this game adds a visual spin on the genre to tell a story of loss and hope. By typing commands into the console you navigate around the world and talk to its inhabitants.

The Void, an inescapable nothingness, shrouds the edge of the world in darkness. The Voidwalkers live at the front of the Void, cut off from the Centre. The broken company monitors changes to the Void by navigating its twisted geometry. Their role was secondary to the people of the Centre, as it was well believed that there was nothing in the Void other than Shades. However, this was soon to change, when the first Devices were found in the Void, mysterious technology from a forgotten age. This is the diary of Voidwalker AO00. 

Playtime: 1-2 hours.
